title: New Guinea Patrol
creator_contributor_role: Australian National Film Board, production company
Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Papua New Guinea - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Papua New Guinea - Exploring expeditions
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Papua New Guinea - Southern Highlands
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Discoveries in geography
abstract: Made in 1958 for the Department of Territories by the Commonwealth Film Unit with assistance by Supreme Sound Studios and the Department of Civil Aviation, this film focuses on the exploration and surveying of the high interior of New Guinea.
description: Follows the work of a three-month expedition to survey and open up uncontrolled territory in the Papuan highlands.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003003; Papua New Guinea: 40 Years of Independence; Active; 2014
